snippet: Vox Media recently raised $34 million in new investment capital, helping give it the money to buy the Curbed, Eater and Racked sites.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Vox Media plans to announce it is buying Curbed.com LLC, which runs three web publications that deliver in-depth neighborhood coverage or real estate, dining and retailing.
lead_paragraph: Vox Media recently raised $34 million in new investment capital, helping give it the money to buy the Curbed, Eater and Racked sites.

headline.main: Vox Media Buying Curbed.com Network of Sites
